snippet: The mistakes involve anthrax, plague and viruses that cause encephalitis, which the military studies because of their potential use as biological weapons.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is investigating four Defense Dept labs that may have mishandled pathogens used in bioterrorism research; authorities say there is no evidence lab samples have posed threat to public but they are taking zero-tolerance approach.
lead_paragraph: The mistakes involve anthrax, plague and viruses that cause encephalitis, which the military studies because of their potential use as biological weapons.

headline.main: 4 Pentagon Labs Face Inquiry on Handling of Deadly Germs
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Labs Face Inquiry in Handling of Lethal Germs
